rows.label: bf10380100_0010
rows.name: Words can be a curse.

rows.label: bf10380100_0020
rows.name: That curse was what kept him tied down here.

rows.label: bf10380100_0030
rows.name: A wretched tale, isn't it?

rows.label: bf10380100_0040
rows.name: This whole world is a wretched place!

rows.label: bf10380100_0050
rows.name: Do not forget that you too are a part of that world.

rows.label: bf10380100_0060
rows.name: If it were not for you, for Marveni...

rows.label: bf10380100_0070
rows.name:
Both Shin and Laura's lives may
have taken quite different paths.

rows.label: bf10380100_0080
rows.name: Exactly! That's exactly it!

rows.label: bf10380100_0090
rows.name: You've gotten smarter with age, huh?

rows.label: bf10380100_0100
rows.name:
I'm a wretched being too!
A hideous monster, far beyond saving!

rows.label: bf10380100_0110
rows.name: ...So let's end this now.

rows.label: bf10380100_0120
rows.name: Don't you feel anything?

rows.label: bf10380100_0130
rows.name: Father's sadness? The world he longed for?!

rows.label: bf10380100_0140
rows.name: How could I?

rows.label: bf10380100_0150
rows.name: That isn't...

rows.label: bf10380100_0152
rows.name: my role in this world.

rows.label: bf10380100_0160
rows.name: This man... Does he mean to...?!

rows.label: bf10380100_0170
rows.name:
Come at me, kid!
Come, my partner!

rows.label: bf10380100_0180
rows.name: Give me all you've got...

rows.label: bf10380100_0190
rows.name: You better show me all of it!

rows.label: bf10380100_0200
rows.name: The extent of your will!

rows.label: bf10380100_0210
rows.name: Show me why you're here in this world!
